action.action-desc: Mr. Davidson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to strike a provision relating to earnings on balances, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fiscal Accountability for Interest on Reserves Act or the FAIR Act.

subsection.text: Section 19(b) of the Federal Reserve Act (12 U.S.C. 461(b)) is amended by striking paragraph (12).
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date that is 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
